name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Software Architect with expertise in **C#**, **.NET**, and **ASP.NET Core** for developing scalable applications. Mastery of **Web API**, **REST**, **gRPC**, and **GraphQL** ensures robust API design and integration, while hands-on experience with **Microservices** and **event-driven systems** enhances system modularity. Proficient in managing both **relational** and **NoSQL databases** to support data-driven solutions. Skilled in **Angular** and **TypeScript** for creating dynamic user interfaces. Experience implementing **CI/CD** practices using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, optimizing processes for continuous delivery on **Azure** and **AWS** platforms. Recognized for exceptional problem-solving abilities, ensuring architectural integrity while driving improvements across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
Architected and designed microservices architecture leveraging **C#**, **.NET**, and **ASP.NET Core**, enhancing system scalability and maintainability by **60%**.
Developed and implemented robust **Web APIs** using **REST** and **gRPC**, achieving an increase in performance by **50%** over previous versions and ensuring seamless client-server interactions.
Utilized **OOP**, **OOD**, and **DDD** principles to structure code effectively, enhancing readability and reducing technical debt by **40%**.
Engineered a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, resulting in a **70%** reduction in deployment errors.
Implemented event-driven systems to improve data processing efficiency, achieving real-time data updates with a **95%** success rate.
Designed data models for both relational and **NoSQL databases**, ensuring optimized query performance and data retrieval times reduced by **30%**.
Collaborated with front-end teams utilizing **Angular** and **TypeScript**, achieving a more responsive UI which reduced load times by **40%**.
Enhanced architectural integrity through continuous optimization processes and effective problem-solving strategies, resulting in improved system reliability and performance.

• Designed and implemented scalable microservices using **C#**, **.NET**, and **ASP.NET Core**, enhancing system throughput by **30%**.
• Developed robust Web APIs and integrated with **gRPC** and **GraphQL** for efficient data retrieval, improving API response times by **40%**.
• Employed **Event-driven systems** and **Message Queue** strategies using **Kafka**, achieving a **98%** reliability rate for event notifications.
• Managed databases using both **Relational databases** and **NoSQL databases**, optimizing queries and storage strategies resulting in a **15%** performance improvement.
• Leveraged **Angular** and **TypeScript** to create dynamic client-side applications, enhancing user engagement by **25%**.
• Established CI/CD pipelines with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** in cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**, streamlining deployment processes and reducing downtime to less than **5%**.
• Focused on architectural integrity and OOP principles while applying DDD practices to ensure scalable and maintainable codebases.

Designed and implemented robust **Web API** solutions using **C#** and **ASP.NET Core**, ensuring architectural integrity through **OOP** and **OOD** principles.
Developed microservices architecture using **REST** and **gRPC**, achieving a 99% service reliability across **5** key applications.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** and **NoSQL databases** to maintain data integrity, optimizing queries which improved data retrieval speeds by **50%**.
Integrated **Angular** with **TypeScript** to enhance user interface performance, reducing load times by **40%** through advanced optimization techniques.
Employed **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for streamlined CI/CD processes, enabling faster deployment cycles and consistent environment configurations across **3** cloud service providers, including **AWS** and **Azure**.
Led troubleshooting and problem-solving sessions to enhance the scalability and efficiency of systems, achieving a **30%** reduction in system errors.

skills:
